name: Blob Squad (ChrisAP)
description:
A puzzle-platformer about a Blob who discovers the power of sticking together and joining forces! 

Use WASD to move and SPACE BAR to jump as well as ARROW KEYS to rotate your blob body! 

Press ESCAPE to pause or quit the game, but make your escape as you dodge spikes and water bullets!

12 levels of ribbiting gameplay! 

Slow and steady might win the race, but it won’t get you an S Rank! 

So is a bird in the hand really worth two in the bush?

BLOB SQUAD!
